1.name: Mean Girls
1.description: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

2.name: Troy
2.description: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.

3.name: Napoleon Dynamite
3.description: A listless and alienated teenager decides to help his new friend win the class presidency in their small western high school, while he must deal with his bizarre family life back home.

4.name: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
4.description: A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain.

5.name: White Chicks
5.description: Two disgraced FBI agents go way undercover in an effort to protect hotel heiresses the Wilson Sisters from a kidnapping plot.

6.name: The Village
6.description: A series of events tests the beliefs of a small isolated countryside village.

7.name: Shaun of the Dead
7.description: A man's uneventful life is disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

8.name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
8.description: It's Harry's third year at Hogwarts; not only does he have a new "Defense Against the Dark Arts" teacher, but there is also trouble brewing. Convicted murderer Sirius Black has escaped the Wizards' Prison and is coming after Harry.

9.name: The Notebook
9.description: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.

10.name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
10.description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

11.name: The Aviator
11.description: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.

12.name: The Incredibles
12.description: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

13.name: The Girl Next Door
13.description: A teenager's dreams come true when a former porn star moves in next door and they fall in love.

14.name: Saw
14.description: Two strangers, who awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer.

15.name: The Phantom of the Opera
15.description: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured and murderous musical genius who lives beneath the Paris Opéra House.

16.name: The Machinist
16.description: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

17.name: Van Helsing
17.description: The notorious monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for some sinister purpose.

18.name: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
18.description: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

19.name: Crash
19.description: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

20.name: The Day After Tomorrow
20.description: Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek from Washington, D.C. to New York City to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

21.name: Hellboy
21.description: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

22.name: EuroTrip
22.description: Dumped by his girlfriend, a high school grad decides to embark on an overseas adventure in Europe with his friends.

23.name: Spider-Man 2
23.description: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.

24.name: Hauru no ugoku shiro
24.description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

25.name: Ocean's Twelve
25.description: Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Ocean's 11.

26.name: I, Robot
26.description: In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.

27.name: Der Untergang
27.description: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

28.name: Million Dollar Baby
28.description: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

29.name: Layer Cake
29.description: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

30.name: 9 Songs
30.description: In London, intense sexual encounters take place between an American college student, named Lisa, and an English scientist, named Matt, between attending rock concerts.

31.name: The Passion of the Christ
31.description: Depicts the final twelve hours in the life of Jesus of Nazareth, on the day of his crucifixion in Jerusalem.

32.name: Dawn of the Dead
32.description: A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman, and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.

33.name: Closer
33.description: The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.

34.name: Man on Fire
34.description: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

35.name: The Butterfly Effect
35.description: Evan Treborn suffers blackouts during significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life by reading his journal.

36.name: The Punisher
36.description: An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante assassin and sets out to unleash his wrath upon the corrupt businessman who slaughtered his entire family at a reunion.

37.name: Collateral
37.description: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

38.name: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
38.description: Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top-rated newsman in the male-dominated broadcasting of the 1970s, but that's all about to change for Ron and his cronies when an ambitious woman is hired as a new anchor.

39.name: A Series of Unfortunate Events
39.description: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.

40.name: A Cinderella Story
40.description: Routinely exploited by her wicked stepmother, the downtrodden Sam Montgomery is excited about the prospect of meeting her Internet beau at the school's Halloween dance.

41.name: Starsky & Hutch
41.description: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear".

42.name: 50 First Dates
42.description: Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment up until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams, until he discovers she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.

43.name: The Terminal
43.description: An Eastern European tourist unexpectedly finds himself stranded in JFK airport, and must take up temporary residence there.

44.name: King Arthur
44.description: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

45.name: Friday Night Lights
45.description: Based on H.G. Bissinger's book, which profiled the economically depressed town of Odessa, Texas and their heroic high school football team, The Permian High Panthers.

46.name: National Treasure
46.description: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.

47.name: 13 Going on 30
47.description: A girl makes a wish on her thirteenth birthday, and wakes up the next day as a thirty-year-old woman.

48.name: Catwoman
48.description: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

49.name: Hotel Rwanda
49.description: Paul Rusesabagina was a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.

50.name: The Bourne Supremacy
50.description: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.
